body.change_summary: Refactored the internal _process_single_task method by extracting logic into _execute_and_validate_handler for clarity. No intended functional changes.
body.validation_status: Syntax check passed. Flake8 linting failed but fixes were aborted due to tool issues.
body.impact_assessment: Low. Should not affect agents inheriting from BaseAgent unless they were relying on internal implementation details of _process_single_task.
